{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRK54G |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/25/2005 |manuf_country=China |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRK54GV2 |ic_id=3839A-WRK54GV2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2315A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=25P16V6P |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-7 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2315A |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6995LC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1A:70 |oui_eth=00:1A:70 }} ''Wireless-G Broadband Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRK54G}} WRK54G v2 serial numbers appear to start with '''CGT2'''. [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=34356 On the DD-WRT forums] {{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRK54G_v2.0}} The default SSID is probably '''linksys'''. {{WiFiCert|WFA3926|10/14/2005}}
